You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Request a Patch URL for CloudCraze 4.8 or Earlier

The URL for installing a patch for CloudCraze 4.8 or earlier in a sandbox or production org is available only by submitting a Support & Services case.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

Any org installing a patch for:

CloudCraze 4.8
CloudCraze 4.7
CloudCraze 4.6
CloudCraze 4.5
Access the Salesforce Support & Services page.
Log in to the Trailblazer Community.
Click the Help tab.
From Salesforce Help, select Support & Services.
Create a case.
On the Support & Services page, click Create a Case.
For the topic, select B2B Commerce, and click Next.
For the category, select B2B Commerce, and click Next.
For the support area, select Other, and enter a subject line for your case, such as:
Request patch URL for CloudCraze version 4.8
Under Support options, select Create a Case.
Complete the case form.
Be sure to include the following information:
Org ID
CloudCraze major version number, such as 4.8
CloudCraze current build number, such as 3.133.28
Click Submit.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
